text: I rarely leave reviews, but I couldn't let this one go by without being recognized.  The Restoration1 team had an enormous undertaking when my 3,000+ Sq. Ft. house caught fire. They cleaned what was left and kept us updated of our home's status the entire way.  They were such a pleasure to be around and deal with.  They understood that losing your home of many decades was emotional and handled us and our items with care.  They answered all of our questions (and we had tons) along the way.  They even helped us transition into working with our contractor.  Each and every one of them were so knowledgeable, paired with being personable and so kind-you just can't beat that!   I would definitely recommend them for any Water, Fire, Mold, and/or Smoke damage.  You certainly won't be disappointed!

This is not an excuse, but an explanation of why this unfortunate event may have happened. text: We have utilized the services of Restoration 1 many times here on the Gulf Coast and are overwhelmed with their turnaround time and workmanship.  These guys are very good at what they do and are very pleasant, punctual, persistent and professional.  They are very knowledgeable in all aspects of microbial activity and what steps to take to eradicate the problem.  I highly recommend this company if you should find yourself in a position to warrant their services.  These guys will walk you through the process step by step and explain everything to you in a way that you can understand it, they talk to you not over you.  Restoration 1 does an excellent job of quarantine throughout your home so that if there is any microbial activity in certain areas it does not get to the rest of the house during the work being performed on your home.   These guys do it all, they handle Fire and Smoke Restoration, Water Damage Restoration, and Applied Microbial Remediation.  Again, I highly recommend Pete, Charlie and their crew to everyone needing restoration or remediation services.

From the moment I began the search for granite countertop installation I felt valued as a customer. My phone calls and texts were responded to promptly and installation was sooner than expected. Mr Chris even worked around an unforseen appt that I had to help my parents with. My son spilled sweet tea on the kitchen floor during the remodel and one of Mr Chris's men cleaned it up so they wouldn't track it through the house whilst working in my home! There were many small situations that cropped up during the remodel, such as old plumbing and two mirrors that had to be removed and then replaced which were done with no complaints. My new granite is truly a work of art in my eyes and I thank Mr Chris, Jon and all the crew for their professionalism and kindness. I have already referred them to friends and family.

name: Kirsten Warren
text: Completed a service at least a year ago and invoiced for payment, still have not been paid. Bill was at least $4K.

resp.text: Kristen,  this is not the correct company.  This Kitchen Bath Floors and More, LLC started operations in Sept. of 2020.  I am sorry that this happened to you, but we would appreciate it if you would kindly take down your negative review, as we do not opperate in this manner.  You are more than welcome to check out our website at www.kbfmllc.com to verify. We wish you luck in your payment request.

text: These people are awesome!  They have come through for me and many of my referred friends repeatedly over the years. Owners Chuck & DeLayne Garrett truly care about the individuals and will work with you to create your dream remodel/update/repair. In my case my home was destroyed (twice), once by hurricane and once by flood. Chuck fixed us up, better than previous AND worked with our insurance company to come in ahead of schedule and under budget.

text: They installed granite . 2 weeks after the date . They left my house trashed you could write in the dust on everything . They took my need shop vac . When I asked about it . They said I found it and we will return it . 1 month later still no shop vac . They sub there work to anybody . Beware !!!

resp.text: We are sorry you feel this way.  It took 2 weeks after the original date as we were waiting for  customer to choose new granite. Once chosen, we fabricated and installed immediately.  We did not use any sub contractors on your job.  We also offered a cleaning service which was declined.  We did however,  credit you $150.00 on your final invoice.  It has not yet been 1 month, our last communication  which was dated 4/20/21. We realized we had your shop vac which was identical to ours. We are 100 % willing to return to you, when you are back in town.

name: Rick Harris
text:
Lisenby Construction just finished a three-week remodel of our kitchen and living room, and we could not be more pleased.  The project involved demo of some existing kitchen cabinets, replacement of a cook top and stove with a range, replacement of a vent hood, installing new kitchen lighting, laying tile, painting cabinets and bookshelves, painting trim, and painting walls.  All of this was handled by David's crew without having to sub out any work. The quality of the work done was really top-tier.  We used David's decorating consultant, Lindy, to help pick out colors, and the result has significantly brightened and beautified the two rooms where we spend most of our waking hours.

When you undertake a project that takes this much time, you quickly realize that you have invited some strangers into your home for a lengthy stay.   Well, the guys David sent did not stay strangers for very long.  They were cheerful, friendly, and helpful to us.  They added, without cost, some features to the project at our request, even though these features were not in the original contract-- for example, installing a dimmer switch in the kitchen, replacing flood lights in our dinette area so they would match the color put out by our new kitchen lighting, cutting out the trim along one wall of our living room so our bookcase could lay flat against the wall, and installing wall outlets in our bookcase.  They cleaned up after themselves every day and hauled away their own trash.  When they moved furniture around to do some painting, they always put it back where it had been.  It got to where we enjoyed having the company at our house.  At the end of the job, we were glad it was completed, but we were sorry to see the guys leave.

All the work was done with great attention to detail.  They found and installed tile to match our existing kitchen backsplash tile.  They worked on our project every weekday for three weeks.  On some days, they worked on our cabinet doors and bookcase at their shop, but on the days when they did not come, David always called us to let us know they would not be there and what they would be doing that day.

We will certainly call on Lisenby Construction if we undertake new remodeling projects.  Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you Rick for your kind words and for trusting us with your home remodeling needs!

name: Susan Schneider
text: The end product exceeded our expectations. The quality of the craftsmanship was excellent. The Lisenby team was courteous, professional and provided excellent quality work. I would recommend them to anyone anticipating a home upgrading.

resp.text: Thank you Susan! We enjoyed working with you guys! Your new Kitchen is beautiful!

name: Caitlin Singletary
text: This was our first remodel, and it could not have gone smoother! The team was easy to talk to, and they were easy to reach when we had questions. They kept us up-to-date on expectations and the timing of everything. The remodel took 4 days (from demo to completion). The team arrived early each day, and they even worked holidays. They cleaned up daily (vacuumed and cleaned stainless steel appliances). We were also impressed when working with a company they contracted with. While the other company was doing their part, the Lisenby team was present, and they made sure the job was done right/well. In fact, at one point, the Lisenby team told the other team to fix something before leaving. Overall, we were highly impressed, and we intend to work with Lisenby again in the near future when we do additional remodeling!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us work on your kitchen Caitlin, we will look forward to working with you again! And thank you referring to us as a team, we work hard on developing a team culture here.

text: I have had MA Jackson Co do a few projects for me over this past year and have been happy with the results.  Because of my disability due to cancer and amputation surgery, I had to have my master bathroom remodeled to install a walk-in handicap-accessible bathtub as well as open up a wall so that I can get into the toilet with my wheelchair.  Also had cement ramps built up at the front and back doors.  Aside from the medically necessary remodel, I also had a screened-in back porch put up and it's so perfect for us and the cats love it!!!  Just be patient as their crew is sometimes backed up with projects.  His guys are very respectful and friendly.

name: Susan Goodson
text: We met this company at a home show in Huntsville.  At that time, we were in the process of selling our home and from the feedback we received, folks were wanting lighter cabinets which is why we spoke to them.   Fast forward a few months.  I rec'd a call from the company following up from our contact.  I scheduled an appt. but told the caller we have since moved but the home we own now was in need of a kitchen re-model.  The appt. came and went and no one showed.  Come to find out, rep went to our old address ( I gave new address during the phone call)  I called them to reschedule.  Rep showed up at our home and that was the end of the beginning.  He did not listen to us.  We did no want re-facing but he continued to measure existing cabinets which we did no intend to keep.  I asked to look at the books he brought in.  He asked rather snarkily, have you checked out our website???  Yes, but since you have books can I look?  At the  end of a very awkward meeting, he said they have a designer that could help with what we want.  We have not heard anything from this company 4 months later.  The end.  Would not recommend this company.

resp.text:
I'm repeating here my response that I sent you on Saturday when you came in to the showroom. I appreciate your review, and I hope that you are as diligent to leave good reviews for businesses where you have a good experience.

I’m so sorry you had a bad experience. That’s a lady we hire to come in and clean on Saturday and be there to have the showroom open for people to look and take their info if they want us to come out and give them an estimate. She’s not really able to answer many questions but she is usually very friendly and helpful. I would be glad to answer any questions you have.

I just spoke with her. She said she spoke when y’all came in. She’s a little COVID paranoid because she takes care of her elderly mother and she forgot her mask today. She also said she didn’t want y’all to feel like she was following you around.  She should have told you that and that she would be glad to try to answer any questions. Again I apologize and would be glad to answer any questions you might have about a remodel or new construction job.

name: Victoria Gann
text: They are great to work with. They installed one roof for me. Repaired a different one and found the source of the leak, vent cap damaged. They have fixed flashing for me and fixed several worn boots at different properties. They have also inspected a roof for a new purchase and was able to give me a detailed report. They are the most responsive and thorough business I have ever dealt with.

name: April Orr
text: From the initial contact with ICS, I was impressed with their professionalism and attention to detail. Scott was such a pleasure to work with and gave me all of the details and options I needed to make the best decision for my home. He did such a great job keeping me updated that I never had to wonder what was going on with my project and in fact, when he gave me a timeline, things were completed ahead of that. Scott clearly enjoys his job and I value his expertise and passion to perform at the highest of his abilities. The roofers themselves were polite, clean and on-time. They were respectful of my property and ensured none of my plants were damaged and my yard was completely spotless before they left. I received several quotes for my job and Scott and his boss worked diligently to not only earn our business, but to make our insurance claim payment stretch as far as possible. I would recommend ICS without hesitation.

name: Carol Ann Simonds
text: I had a leak and they came within a few hrs of calling to tarp it.  I had a whole roof + decking put on a few weeks later and they were professional, worked well w our Insurance company. Crew was much quicker than the previous roofing company from 15 years ago. Start to finish,  good experience.

name: Sherry Oldham-Coffee
text: Recently had ICS do a roof on an older home. Jonathan was very professional and pleasant when giving the bid and all throughout the process. Communication was fantastic. Had 3 bids and I usually go with the middle bid but I was so impressed with the thorough inspection and bid that I chose ICS even though theirs was the lowest of the three. Had to wait about a month or so for roof to actually go on. Roof looks great and they didn't leave any mess behind so that was also a plus. I would highly recommend ICS Roofing.

name: Beth Kristensen
text: If you need work done to your roof, this is the BEST company to use.  Jonathan came to our home, explained what was needed (a whole new roof) and why.  We had noticed some shingles had fallen from our roof but he showed us pictures of many other shingles (that we were unaware of) that had also blown off.  ICS dealt with our homeowners insurance through the whole process.  The entire company is honest and courteous.  Jonathan kept us informed from start to finish, and everything was done exactly as he promised.  The roof was replaced, the job was done quickly and more importantly, perfectly.  Our new roof is beautiful and the crew that installed it left the exterior of our home and yard cleaner than they found it.  Do not hesitate to use ICS!  Thank you ICS!!

name: Mark Wells
text: From start to finish, this company was highly professional. Project manager, David, was exceptional through the entire process and the work done high quality. Good prices with excellent results.

I have never had a company work as hard as this one did to get my roof replaced with a days notice.  I cannot stress how great this company was and especially Jonathan Weston who stayed in touch with me from the time the adjuster came until the day it was completed.
He went above and beyond for me.
Thank you ICS for having personnel that cares!

name: Patrick James
text: I had active leaks from storm damage that went unnoticed until water began running into my home. I needed help taking the right steps to quickly stop the damage that was occurring and I did not know who to ask.  I happened to mention my plight to an ICS employee who had dropped by the business where I work, and the ICS team literally did the rest. My project manager, David Prejeant, contacted me,  took the time, and made every effort to baby step me through the proceedures with little worry on my part.  Once the day was set, their install team efficiently and professionally installed our new roof. Once the job was complete, the install team left very little evidence that anyone had been on my roof and my property other than the roof was obviously new and the leaks had stopped.  Then,  the thing that was the ultimate reward for having done business with them, ICS sent an inspector back out after completion to insure the work met their high standards of quality.  On this inspection trip,  the gentleman took extra time to run a magnet around to check again that no troublesome tacks were left behind.  I am thankful I shared my plight with the right person that day!

name: Steveandpamela Valdez
text: They did the work fast and were very thorough. The workers were extremely well disciplined and made sure everything was covered, including our pool, to insure a clean job. When they were through, you couldn’t tell the workers were ever here except for the wonderful roof.  Special thanks to Scott for working so efficiently with us to get everything taken care of in a timely manner.

name: Chip Lazenby
text: Just had roof replaced by Jamie Harris with ICS roofing in Sheffield. Excellent work, start to finish. Jamie was very patient, professional and helpful from start to finish. He made the process easy and non-stressful. The work crew did an excellent job and were friendly and professional. Check these guys out if you need a new roof.

I would recommend ICS for your roofing needs. Jamie Harris was very nice to work with.
I have several neighbors who have used this business and all were pleased with their work.
